Package comp3111.covid

Class TableBController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.covid.TableController
comp3111.covid.TableBController
public class TableBController
extends TableController
A controller class that handles initializations of elements within the TableB Tab, and the updating of TableB itself.

    • updateTable

      protected void updateTable​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      The method that updates tableBView to be displayed, invoked whenever there is a change in selected date and list of countries. This method is equivalent to the parent class's variant.
      Overrides:
      updateTable in class TableController
      Parameters:
      e - the event

    • getTableData

      protected java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>> getTableData()
      A method that returns table data, in the form of a List of Maps. Invoked when there is an update to table. Each Map is in the format: 
                      {
                        "Country": name_of_country,
                        "Total Deaths": total_deaths,
                        "Total Deaths (per 1M)": total_deaths_per_1M
                }
      Specified by:
      getTableData in class TableController
      Returns:
      Returns table data in the form of a List of Maps

    • loadTable

      protected void loadTable()
      A method that loads the table into tableBView. Invoked when there is an update to table.
      Specified by:
      loadTable in class TableController
